p.membercontribution:
approval, interim arrangements for the remainder of this Session have already been made after discussion through the usual channels. Discussions will be held about the roster for the new Session."
The last paragraph, as your Lordships know, is not really applicable to us, but some arrangements will be necessary here.

p.i: Following are the other aspects of the change referred to in the Statement:

section.title: MACHINERY OF GOVERNMENT CHANGES
section.p: 1. The main changes in the Machinery of Government, announced by the Prime Minister to-day, are as follows:
